title: How do people use a monitor connected to their laptops but with the laptop closed? - Quora

response.answer_text: When u connect your laptop to monitor or any other source of output…..you can either choose to duplicate ur screen or extend ur screen or display only on monitor/laptop screen…..if you choose to display only monitor…..you can safely close the laptop lid and the laptop will still remain on and you can continue your work on the external source of display……that's how it works

You have to change your lid close action in battery manager under lid open and close function in advanced properties. Set the lid close property to DO NOTHING. ONCE YOU DO THAT, PLUG THE HDMi, extend or mirror the screen and close the laptop and use an external keyboard and mouse.
